EmailTemplate.name: Corp Comm.AC - 9-19-14
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal's Open Source Indemnification Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Team,
I'm pleased to announce Pivotal's Open Source Indemnification Program (“the Program <http://www.pivotal.io/open-source-indemnification-program>”). The Program provides Pivotal customers with protection against intellectual property claims based on Pivotal-developed open source software in our products. The Program allows ​you to proactively highlight to customers the indemnification protections we offer. Please see our "Talking Points <https://docs.google.com/a/pivotal.io/viewer?a=v&pid=sites&srcid=cGl2b3RhbC5pb3xpbnNpZGUtcGl2b3RhbHxneDozNWRmYTg1ZTY3ODJjYjUz>", which are for your internal use, and which will help you explain Pivotal's indemnity policy to customers, promote deal velocity, and ensure that we speak with a unified voice about our policies.
The Program and Talking Points demonstrate that Pivotal's polices are industry-standard, and in many cases, better than what our competition offers. We will soon release a video featuring Pivotal’s executives to further underscore the rationale behind the Program and our indemnification policy.
Please reach out to me <mailto:acohen@pivotal.io> or to Susie Gilfix <mailto:sgilfix@pivotal.io> with any questions about the Program or the Talking Points.
Make it Happen.
-Andy
